post_text: The Riddle Elementary School Panther Parent Group is selling Roseburg Cinema 2018 SummerFest punch cards! The cards, valued at $15, are available for purchase for only $10! All seating is on a first-come, first-serve basis. To purchase a punch card, visit the Riddle Elementary School office. Thanks for your support!
